arts.ttl: Toulouse vs PSG – Neves looks back on his stunning goals!
arts.sum: João Neves, 20-year-old right midfielder for Paris Saint-Germain, spoke to Ligue 1+ after the 3-6 victory over Toulouse this Saturday at the Stadium as part of Matchday 3 of Ligue 1 2025-2026. He naturally mentioned his spectacular hat-trick. Neves: “I like this kind of move, and if I can do it in training, why not […]

arts.ttl: Neves hat trick as PSG beats Toulouse 6-3 and Lorient fans get a second-half shock
arts.sum: Joao Neves scored a spectacular hat trick as Paris Saint-Germain beat host Toulouse 6-3 in the French league on Saturday, and home fans at Lorient vs. Lille pressed the ballistic button to score five late goals in its 7-1 demolition of Lorient.

arts.ttl: Toulouse vs PSG (3-6) video highlights, Crazy match with 3 gems from Neves!
arts.sum: Watch below the video highlights of Toulouse vs. PSG, featuring goals from João Neves, Bradley Barcola, Ousmane Dembélé, and Charlie Cresswell. Paris Saint-Germain, after a match that wasn’t always under control but was marked by exceptional efficiency, including a display from Neves, won 2-6 at the Stade de France against Toulouse on Matchday 3 of […]

arts.ttl: Toulouse vs PSG – Dembélé gives an update on his injury and the strength of his team
arts.sum: Ousmane Dembélé, 28-year-old Paris Saint-Germain striker, spoke to Ligue 1+ after the 3-6 victory over Toulouse this Saturday at the Stadium as part of Matchday 3 of Ligue 1 2025-2026. He discussed his absence with a muscle problem, adapting to the victory, and his contribution to the goals. Dembélé: “We’ll have an MRI and see. […]

arts.ttl: Toulouse vs PSG – The Parisians’ ratings: Dembélé’s coldness and Neves’ hurricane
arts.sum: This Saturday, on Matchday 3 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season, Paris Saint-Germain faced Toulouse at the Stade de France. After a match in which the Rouge et Bleu largely dominated, they won 3-6. Here are our ratings for the Parisians. Goalkeeper – Lucas Chevalier (6) – It’s unusual, he saved two penalties, and he […]

arts.ttl: Toulouse vs PSG – Spectacle, confidence and Dembélé’s injury, Luis Enrique’s strong words
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain won 3-6 against Toulouse this Saturday at the Stadium as part of Matchday 3 of Ligue 1 2025-2026. After the match, Parisian coach Luis Enrique spoke to Ligue 1+. Luis Enrique: “It’s a bit like a pre-season match.” A high-quality evening for football fans, but perhaps you experienced it differently? In my opinion, […]

arts.ttl: Toulouse vs PSG – Dembélé goes off with a muscle strain!
arts.sum: Ousmane Dembélé, 28-year-old Paris Saint-Germain striker, was forced off during the match against Toulouse this Saturday evening (Matchday 3 of Ligue 1) despite starting. This was due to what appears to be a muscle discomfort, although not necessarily serious. “Ousmane Dembélé, who suffered a hamstring injury, was taken off tonight against Toulouse.” We’ll have to […]

arts.ttl: Toulouse vs PSG – The Parisians’ record start to the match!
arts.sum: This Saturday evening, Paris Saint-Germain faces Toulouse at the Stade de Toulouse in Matchday 3 of Ligue 1. With the score tied 4-1 at halftime, Paris has already broken a record in its history. Indeed, the Parisians have scored three goals in less than 15 minutes for the first time in their history. It’s a […]

arts.ttl: Toulouse vs PSG – Possible Parisian lineup and suspension risks
arts.sum: This Saturday, third-placed Paris Saint-Germain will face second-placed Toulouse at the Stade de France in Matchday 3 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 (kick-off at 9:05 p.m., CET). Parisian coach Luis Enrique must choose his starting 11 players, taking into account the opponent, upcoming matches, and suspension risks, after assembling the Parisian squad for this match. […]

arts.ttl: Toulouse vs PSG – Relive the Parisians’ training
arts.sum: This Saturday, Paris Saint-Germain will be at the Stadium to face Toulouse (kick-off at 9:05 p.m., CET) as part of the 3rd day of Ligue 1 2025-2026. While waiting for this match, the club allows you to relive the best moments of training during the week in order to prepare for this meeting. ﻿
